interestingcomments.content:
Home archive /!/ 
Thought I’d drop this here. 
  I have a lifetime collection of old Ektachrome,/ Kodachrome positives, color, and black and white negatives I want to convert to digital. I want to do it myself. I’m largely concerned about quality, but budget is a huge constraint. I don’t own a DSLR or scanner. I have a good light box, and a bunch of great vintage lenses, a laptop with windows 7, no software and $300 USD.  What would you do?
